SCRCdataAPI 1.13.2
  • Reference

bin_ages

Source: R/bin_ages.R
bin_ages.Rd

Function used to bin ages in a data.frame

bin_ages(dat, ageclasses)

Arguments

dat

a data.frame containing population counts (see Examples below)
ageclasses

a data.frame containing age class boundaries

Examples

# NRS example
df <- matrix(sample(273), ncol = 91)
colnames(df) <- paste0("AGE", 0:90)
colnames(df)[91] <- "AGE90+"
bin_ages(df, c(0, 10, 50, 80))

#>      AGE0-9 AGE10-49 AGE50-79 AGE80+
#> [1,]   1806     6035     3998   1320
#> [2,]    957     4739     4563   1664
#> [3,]   1115     4763     4647   1794
bin_ages(df, "total")

#>   total
#> 1 13159
#> 2 11923
#> 3 12319
